title: Baltic Prime Ministers meeting in Rīga
summary_full: On Friday, December 12th, a meeting of the three Baltic Prime Ministers will be held in Rīga, chaired by Latvian Prime Minister Evika Siliņa.
summary_public: On Friday, December 12th, a meeting of the three Baltic Prime Ministers will be held in Rīga, chaired by Latvian Prime Minister Evika Siliņa.
